title: Contributing to events.json
contents:
Contributing to events.jsonlink

About this listlink

We maintain a list of events (conferences, meetups, etc.) where our team has or will be presenting. This data is stored in events.json.

How to get an event listedlink

The events.json file is periodically generated from data stored in a Firebase database. See here for more details.

If you want to get an event listed, please get in touch with the Angular DevRel team at devrel@angular.io.

WARNING: The events.json file is only intended to be updated via a script. Do not manually edit the file, because your changes will be overwritten the next time the script runs.
